report.title: Candy Freaking
report.author: Ignis
report.bodytext: The events listed happened on new years eve. /n /n The 2CT7 was bought in a smart shop in Holland (at the time of the events it was still legal to posses T7 in the Netherlands, it became illegal a couple of months later). The little blue box contained 3 blue mystic pills of 10 mg each. I had snorted half a crushed tablet before and gone to a party without any adverse effects. In fact, the first time I had taken the T7 I had a wonderful time. /n /n The MDMA was obtained from my regular partner in fine chemicals. He never ripped me off, he never sold me rubbish. No difference this time. I had taken the pills (two double stacked Mitsubishis to be precise) before at a rave too and enjoyed myself. Although I had to drink a couple of beers to be able to pee (witch was scary at the time). I didnt pay to much attention to it afterwards. /n /n Because I had read so many positive comments about the combination of a hallucinogenic substance with MDMA, I decided to try It myself. Bad Idea; T7 is not your everyday hallucinogenic. /n /n 23:30 arrived at the party, went to the bathroom and snorted 2.5 mg of T7. After the pain had subsided - trust me compared to t7, meth doesnt hurt at all - I went to my friends car to snort the other 2.5 mg. At that time I took one tab of MDMA. By the time I got back at the party the pain was replaced by a feeling of euphoric enlightenment. Felt fine until /n /n 0:15 The MDMA kicked in. the effects developed in the following 15 minutes. The waves of energy had a nasty edge to them that I had never felt before. In stead of a sense of inner peace an intense restlessness took hold of me. I couldnt stand to sit down any longer and started wandering around. When I tried to pee noting came. I drank enough so this wasnt normal at all. This time I completely freaked out. Panic got a hold of me. I locked myself in the bathroom and tried to but my kidneys wouldnt do their thing. /n /n After a while I got myself together and went downstairs to get some beers. I swallowed 2 caffeine pills and had 4 beers. Locked myself up again and waited. This time a couple of beers werent going to do the trick, this time I was going to die. But the diuretics did their job and after half an hour I could pee again. Actually the beers had taken the edge of the whole experience. The fear was gone so I decided to drink some more beers. After about 10 beers I was feeling just perfect, wasnt drunk at all. Wasnt tripping either. Just felt fine. /n /n 6:00 I was getting sober again and the restlessness returned. My muscles were sore and I was shivering. /n /n 8:00 Got home and went to bed but I couldnt sleep and lay awake for a couple of hours. /n /n Every time I went to the bathroom in the two weeks following this experience I felt this slight blunt pain in my lower back. I still wonder if it was just the panic or if there was really something wrong with my kidneys that night. I havent taken any MDMA or T7 since. I will rather live with the question than die finding out. /n /n IGNIS
